original_title: a forecast, a haunting, a crossing, a visitation
overview: Focuses largely on Scotland and Cape Wrath, wherein a series of characters Uranio (Uranium), AguÌˆita (an affectionate name for water) and Vientazo (a gust of wind), write letters to one another. The letters appeal to the water, the wind and the toxic land, speculating upon the navigation of bodily crisis, health and grief, speaking of the feeling of mourning environmental loss.
title: a forecast, a haunting, a crossing, a visitation
